EmailTemplate.subject: Automate Your OVA | Get To Green By End Of Day
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Automate Now.
You're 30 Minutes From Health.
VMTurbo Operations Manager is the most sophisticated virtualization management platform available, but don't just take our word for it. Take theirs: <http://vmturbo.com/resources/videos-main/#Customer%20Success%20Stories?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=trialnurture> If you would like to try any of our product extensions, call the number at the bottom of this email. Available product extensions:
- Network Control Module - Hybrid Cloud Control Module - Application Control Module - VDI Control Module - Container Control Module
- Capacity Planner
- Fabric Control Module - Cloud Control Module
- Storage Control Module
In good health, VMTurbo 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
